channel.title: User Access Node (UAN)
channel.description: Recent content on User Access Node (UAN)

item.description: Install the UAN Product Stream This procedure installs the User Access Nodes (UAN) product on a system so that UAN boot images can be created. Before performing this procedure: Initialize and configure the Cray command line interface (CLI) tool. See “Configure the Cray Command Line Interface (CLI)” in the CSM documentation for more information. Perform Prepare for UAN Product Installation Replace PRODUCT_VERSION in the example commands with the UAN product stream string (2.
